casebody.data:
McNeal, Appellant, v. Morris et al., Appellees; City of Blue Ash, Appellant.

[Cite as McNeal v. Morris, 122 Ohio St.3d 349, 2009-Ohio-3717.]

(No. 2008-1154 Submitted May 19, 2009 Decided August 4, 2009.) Subashi, Wildermuth & Dinkier and Nicholas E. Subashi, for appellants.

{¶ 1} The judgment of the court of appeals is reversed on the authority of Sullivan v. Anderson Twp., 122 Ohio St.3d 83, 2009-0hio-1971, 909 N.E.2d 88, and the cause is remanded for consideration of appellants’ assignment of error.

Moyer, C.J., and Lundberg Stratton, O’Connor, O’Donnell, and Cupp, JJ., concur. Pfeifer and Lanzinger, JJ., dissent.
